entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of wet flurries overnight. Wind light except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 10. POP 70%
